home.title: AI Sales Role-Play
home.subtitle: Improve Your Sales Skills Through AI Conversations
home.description: Experience AI-driven simulations of real sales scenarios to enhance your skills in a safe environment. Engage with various industry clients with different personalities.

step1.title: Select Scenario
step1.description: Choose from various sales scenarios like new acquisition, contract renewal, price negotiation

step2.title: Conduct Meeting
step2.description: Practice sales skills in real-time dialogue with AI characters

step3.title: Check Evaluation
step3.description: Get real-time performance evaluation based on anger, trust, and progress metrics

step4.title: Feedback
step4.description: Detailed analysis of improvement points and success factors

aiPartner.title: AI Sales Partner
aiPartner.description: Practical role-play with NPCs of various personalities and positions

realtime.title: Real-time Evaluation
realtime.description: Monitor anger meter, trust level, and meeting progress in real-time

feedback.title: Personalized Feedback
feedback.description: Analyze conversation content and suggest specific improvement points

conversation.title: Sales Simulation

audioSettings.title: Audio Settings
audioSettings.npcResponseNote: ‚Äª NPC responses will be played as audio
audioSettings.silenceNote: ‚Äª Auto-send after this duration of silence

input.continueVoice: Continue voice input (existing text will be preserved)

emoji.description: Displays the current emotional state of the NPC

conversation.npcVoicePlayback: * NPC responses will be played as voice

metrics.angerMeterTooltip: Higher values indicate customer's dissatisfaction or anger
metrics.trustLevelTooltip: Higher values indicate that the customer trusts you
metrics.progressLevelTooltip: Higher values indicate that the conversation is progressing well

error.permissionDenied: No permission for voice recognition. Please allow microphone access.
error.noSpeech: No speech detected. Please try again.
error.network: Network error occurred. Please check your connection.
error.notSupported: Your browser doesn't support speech recognition.
error.unknown: Speech recognition error occurred. Please try again.

scenarios.title: Scenario List
scenarios.subtitle: Select a scenario to practice. Each scenario has different difficulty levels and NPC characters.

management.title: Scenario Management
management.subtitle: Edit, delete, import, and export your scenarios
management.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this scenario?
management.importDuplicateError: Import failed: Scenario ID already exists. Duplicate IDs are not allowed during import.

create.title: Create Scenario
create.subtitle: Create and share your original scenarios
create.basicInfoDescription: Enter basic information for the scenario. Set title, description, difficulty level, etc.
create.npcInfoDescription: Set up information for the NPC (Non-Player Character) who will be the sales target.
create.goalsDescription: Set goals for this scenario. You can adjust conditions and difficulty for goal achievement.
create.sharingDescription: Configure sharing settings for the scenario. You can specify visibility and sharing targets.
create.previewDescription: Review the content of the created scenario. Save if everything looks correct.
create.scenarioIdHelp: Enter a unique identifier for the scenario (optional, alphanumeric characters and hyphens only)
create.titleHelp: Scenario title should be specific and easy to understand (within 50 characters)
create.descriptionHelp: Describe the scenario overview, background, purpose, etc. (within 300 characters)
create.difficultyHelp: Select the difficulty level of the scenario
create.maxTurnsHelp: Set the maximum number of conversation turns (optional, default value will be used if not set)
create.categoryHelp: Select the industry category this scenario targets
create.languageHelp: Select the language to be used in the scenario
create.npcRoleHelp: Enter the NPC's position or role (within 30 characters)
create.npcCompanyHelp: Enter the name of the company or organization the NPC belongs to (within 50 characters)
create.npcPersonalityHelp: Add personality traits for the NPC. Multiple traits can be added.
create.npcDescriptionHelp: You can freely describe detailed character profile and background for the NPC (optional, within 300 characters)
create.npcInitialMessageHelp: Enter the initial message that the NPC will speak first (optional, within 200 characters)
create.noPersonalityAdded: No personality traits have been added yet
create.noGoalsAdded: No goals have been added yet
create.noObjectivesAdded: No objectives have been added yet
create.initialMessageHelp: Set the initial message that the NPC will speak at the start of the scenario (optional, within 200 characters)
create.initialMetricsHelp: Set initial values at the start of the scenario (can be set in the range of 0-10)
create.angerHelp: Initial value of NPC's anger level (lower is better)
create.trustHelp: Initial value of NPC's trust level (higher is better)
create.progressHelp: Initial value of conversation progress (higher is better)
create.angerLevelHelp: Set the initial value of NPC's anger level (0-10, lower is better)
create.trustLevelHelp: Set the initial value of NPC's trust level (0-10, higher is better)
create.progressLevelHelp: Set the initial value of conversation progress (0-10, higher is better)
create.privateHelp: Private scenario accessible only by you
create.sharedHelp: Shared scenario accessible only by specified users
create.publicHelp: Public scenario accessible by all users
create.guardrailDescription: Detailed description of guardrails to be applied to this scenario
create.noCriteriaAdded: No criteria have been added yet
create.noUsersAdded: No shared users have been added yet
create.visibilityHelp: Set the visibility scope of the scenario
create.sharedWithUsersHelp: Enter email addresses of users to share the scenario with
create.sharedUsersHelp: Enter email addresses of users to share the scenario with
create.guardrailHelp: Select guardrails to apply to this scenario
create.previewWarning: This is a preview. The actual scenario may display differently.
create.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel? Unsaved changes will be lost.

pdfFiles.title: Upload PDF Materials
pdfFiles.description: You can upload PDF files related to the scenario (up to 5 files)
pdfFiles.note: ‚Äª Up to 5 PDF files can be uploaded per scenario
pdfFiles.maxFilesError: You can upload up to 5 PDF files
pdfFiles.onlyPdfError: Only PDF files can be uploaded

edit.title: Edit Scenario
edit.scenarioIdReadOnly: Scenario ID cannot be changed after creation

delete.confirmMessage: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this scenario?

validation.scenarioIdInvalid: Scenario ID can only contain alphanumeric characters and hyphens
validation.scenarioIdTooLong: Scenario ID must be 50 characters or less
validation.scenarioIdDuplicate: This Scenario ID is already in use. Please choose a different ID
validation.scenarioIdImmutable: Scenario ID cannot be changed after creation
validation.titleTooShort: Title must be at least 3 characters
validation.titleTooLong: Title must be 100 characters or less
validation.descriptionTooShort: Description is too short. Please provide more details.
validation.descriptionTooLong: Description must be 1000 characters or less
validation.maxTurnsPositive: Maximum turns must be a positive number
validation.maxTurnsTooLarge: Maximum turns must be 100 or less
validation.npcNameTooShort: NPC name must be at least 2 characters
validation.npcNameTooLong: NPC name must be 50 characters or less
validation.npcRoleTooLong: NPC role must be 100 characters or less
validation.npcCompanyTooLong: NPC company must be 100 characters or less
validation.objectivesRequired: At least one objective is required
validation.goalsRequired: At least one goal is required
validation.goalsCriteriaRequired: All goals must have at least one criteria
validation.sharedUsersRequired: At least one user must be specified for shared scenarios

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.violationsDescription: The following compliance violations were detected during the conversation. Please use appropriate expressions.
compliance.noData: No compliance violation data exists for this session.
compliance.explanation1: Compliance violations refer to expressions or actions that violate laws or ethical standards in sales activities. By avoiding violations, you can build trust with customers and minimize risks.
compliance.explanation2: Use the above report to improve your expressions in future conversations. Pay special attention to "High" severity violations, as they pose significant legal risks.

violations.prohibitedTopicDetected: This topic cannot be mentioned in sales conversations

results.title: Session Results
results.sessionStats: Conversation Time: {{duration}} minutes | Message Count: {{count}} times
results.continuePractice: üèÜ Continue practicing to improve your sales skills
results.buildingSessionObject: Building Session object from basic session information
results.addingMetricsToMessages: Adding metrics change information to messages
results.determiningFinalMetrics: Determining final metrics (using realtime metrics only)
results.incompleteSessionData: Session data is incomplete (realtime metrics not found)
results.settingGoalInfo: Setting goal information (converting string numbers to numbers)
results.generatingScoreAnalysis: Generating score analysis. Please wait a moment.
results.detailedFeedbackNotAvailable: Detailed feedback analysis could not be retrieved. Session data may be incomplete.

profile.title: Profile
profile.usernameNote: * Username will be used as your display name in the system
profile.userIdNote: * This ID is used to identify you in the system

history.title: Session History
history.description: View your past sales roleplay session history
history.searchPlaceholder: Search by session name or NPC name...

errors.connection: Connection error occurred. Please check your internet connection.
errors.server: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.auth: Authentication error occurred. Please log in again.
errors.updateUsername: An error occurred while updating username.
errors.speechRecognition: Speech recognition error occurred. Please use text input.
errors.tts: Text-to-speech error occurred. Continuing with text only.
errors.aiAnalysisFailed: Failed to get detailed AI analysis
errors.sessionLoadFailed: An error occurred while loading session information
errors.contactAdmin: If the problem persists, please contact the administrator.

recording.title: Session Recording
recording.recordingStartRequested: Recording start requested but sessionId is not set. Waiting for sessionId to be set.
recording.s3UploadStart: Starting S3 upload of recording data
recording.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support MP4 recording

videoFeedback.title: Expression & Gesture Analysis
videoFeedback.analysisInProgress: Video analysis is in progress. Please wait a moment.
videoFeedback.recordingSuggestion: Use the recording feature during sessions to see expression and gesture analysis results. Try it in your next session.

referenceCheck.title: Reference Check
referenceCheck.analyzingNote: ‚Äª Processing may take some time. Please wait a moment.
referenceCheck.processingNote: Processing may take some time. Results will be retrieved automatically, so please wait.
referenceCheck.fetchError: Failed to retrieve reference check results
referenceCheck.noData: Reference check for this session has not been executed yet. Please wait.
referenceCheck.noIssues: No consistency issues with documents were found. Appropriate information was provided.
referenceCheck.issuesFoundDescription: Consistency issues with documents were found. Please review the details below.
referenceCheck.explanation1: Reference check is a feature that verifies whether sales representatives' statements are consistent with the content of documents set in the scenario.
referenceCheck.explanation2: By providing accurate information, you can build trust with customers and enhance sales effectiveness. If issues are found, please recheck the document content and strive to provide accurate information.
